issues.description: The templateâ€™s private method singFarmSongVerse is declared without the Animal parameter, but the problem UML and the solution reference singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal). Students will be unable to pass each Animal into the verse printer as intended.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the template method signature in Farm.java to include an Animal parameter: private void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal).

issues.description: The problem statement describes a method named printFarmSong(), but both the template and the solution implement this functionality in a method called singFarmSong(). Students will look for printFarmSong() in the starter code and final implementation and may be unable to locate it, causing confusion when mapping requirements to code.
issues.suggested_fix: Use the same name for the song method across all artifacts. Either rename the template and solution method to printFarmSong(), or update the problem statement to refer to singFarmSong() to match the provided code.
